comments:
Build id: 200403240800

    - open a second IDE with Window -> New Window
    - detach a view in the new window by dragging

The view cannot be reattached to the new window, but will go into the original 
window.

As a side effect, closing the second window will not close the detached view 
(closing the original window will close the detached view).

The detached view (in my case Outline) continues to get its contents updated 
based on the new window.

I found the following in my error log around the same time I noticed the 
problem.

Should address for M8, particularly if there are related exceptions.

Can reproduce the problem as outlined in the original comment but am unable to 
reproduce the exceptions in Comment #1 with build I200403251200.

Fixed in head. The wrong PerspectivePresentation was handling the drop that
caused the view to detach.
